resources.string: Unable to open camera device! Probably locked by another application.
Could not take a picture! Your device probably does not support selected image format, please choose another one in the Image settings.
Unable to reach storage device! Probably is unmounted, please insert SD card.
Unable to create directory structure for saving file! Probably due to permissions or internal error.
Unable to open file for write (%s)!
Unable to save file (%s)! Probably no available space for new data.
